=Installing Mosquitto=

[http://manpages.ubuntu.com/cgi-bin/search.py?q=mosquitto Mosquitto], [http://manpages.ubuntu.com/cgi-bin/search.py?q=mosquitto_pub mosquitto_pub] and [http://manpages.ubuntu.com/cgi-bin/search.py?q=mosquitto_sub mosquitto_sub] are in the official repositories since [https://wiki.ubuntu.com/OneiricOcelot Oneiric Ocelot] (Ubuntu 11.10).

<pre>
$ sudo apt-get install mosquitto
$ sudo apt-get install mosquitto-clients
</pre>
